reviewText: Purchased this for my son who is into demolition derbies. He loves it. Received this very quickly!

Looked interesting after finding the youtube video so I took a gamble and it paid off.  Liked all the camera angles.  All the derby videos I've ever seen is just one camera.  Lots of action on this one and funny parts!  You'll want to buy its end half to see the Final.  Been nice if it was all in one package though or one disc.  Not sure why its on two,
